description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, per Mach and Ormsby. Physical description: 17 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on machine-made paper. Orginal text overlined in red; catchwords. Occasional staining. Incipit: الحمد لله الذي نوهنا اي رفعنا رفعاً معنويا
author: Sabzavārī, Hādī ibn Mahdī, 1797 or 1798-
abstract: The author's commentary on his poem on Islamic law.
extent: 138 leaves : paper ; 170 x 104 (120 x 55) mm bound to 173 x 107 mm
title: [Sharḥ Nibrās al-hudá].
creator: سبزوارى، هادى بن مهدى، 1797 or 1798-
subject: Sabzavārī, Hādī ibn Mahdī, 1797 or 1798-—Nibrās al-hudá.
binding_note: Full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets; salmon paper doublures.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
